verses.verse: And <S%H1212>Bezalel<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H7848>acacia<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%>: two <S%H520>cubits<s%> and a <S%H2677>half<s%> was the <S%H753>length<s%> of <S%H520>it<s%>, and a cubit and a <S%H2677>half<s%> the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> of <S%H520>it<s%>, and a cubit and a <S%H2677>half<s%> the height of <S%H6967>it<s%>.

And he <S%H6823>overlaid<s%> it with <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%> <S%H1004>within<s%> and <S%H2351>without<s%>, and <S%H6213>made<s%> a <S%H2213>crown<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> to it round <S%H5439>about<s%>.

And he <S%H3332>cast<s%> for it <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H2885>rings<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%>, in the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H6471>feet<s%> <S%H8147>thereof<s%>; even two <S%H2885>rings<s%> on the <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6763>side<s%> of <S%H8147>it<s%>, and two <S%H2885>rings<s%> on the <S%H8145>other<s%> side of <S%H6763>it<s%>.
And he <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H905>staves<s%> of <S%H7848>acacia<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%>, and <S%H6823>overlaid<s%> them with <S%H2091>gold<s%>.
And he <S%H935>put<s%> the <S%H905>staves<s%> into the <S%H2885>rings<s%> on the <S%H6763>sides<s%> of the <S%H727>ark<s%>, to <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%>.

And he <S%H6213>made<s%> a <S%H3727>mercy-seat<s%> of <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%>: two <S%H520>cubits<s%> and a <S%H2677>half<s%> was the <S%H753>length<s%> <S%H520>thereof<s%>, and a cubit and a <S%H2677>half<s%> the breadth <S%H7341>thereof<s%>.

And he <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%>; of beaten <S%H4749>work<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> he <S%H8147>them<s%>, at the two <S%H7098>ends<s%> of the <S%H3727>mercy-seat<s%>;

one <S%H259><s%> <S%H3742>cherub<s%> at the one <S%H7098>end<s%>, and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3742>cherub<s%> at the other <S%H7098>end<s%>: of one piece with the <S%H3727>mercy-seat<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> he the <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> at the <S%H8147>two<s%> ends <S%H7098>thereof<s%>.

And the <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> spread <S%H6566>out<s%> their <S%H3671>wings<s%> on <S%H4605>high<s%>, <S%H5526>covering<s%> the <S%H3727>mercy-seat<s%> with their <S%H3671>wings<s%>, with their <S%H6440>faces<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> to <S%H251>another<s%>; toward the <S%H3727>mercy-seat<s%> were the <S%H6440>faces<s%> of the <S%H3742>cherubim<s%>.

And he <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H7979>table<s%> of <S%H7848>acacia<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%>: two <S%H520>cubits<s%> was the <S%H753>length<s%> <S%H520>thereof<s%>, and a cubit the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> <S%H520>thereof<s%>, and a cubit and a <S%H2677>half<s%> the height <S%H6967>thereof<s%>.
And he <S%H6823>overlaid<s%> it with <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%>, and <S%H6213>made<s%> thereto a <S%H2213>crown<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>.

And he <S%H6213>made<s%> unto it a <S%H4526>border<s%> of a <S%H2948>handbreadth<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>, and <S%H6213>made<s%> a <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H2213>crown<s%> to the <S%H4526>border<s%> thereof round <S%H5439>about<s%>.

And he <S%H3332>cast<s%> for it <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H2885>rings<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%>, and <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H2885>rings<s%> in the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H6285>corners<s%> that were on the <S%H702>four<s%> feet <S%H7272>thereof<s%>.
Close <S%H5980>by<s%> the <S%H4526>border<s%> were the <S%H2885>rings<s%>, the <S%H1004>places<s%> for the <S%H905>staves<s%> to <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H7979>table<s%>.
And he <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H905>staves<s%> of <S%H7848>acacia<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%>, and <S%H6823>overlaid<s%> them with <S%H2091>gold<s%>, to <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H7979>table<s%>.

And he <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> which were upon the <S%H7979>table<s%>, the <S%H7086>dishes<s%> <S%H3709>thereof<s%>, and the spoons <S%H4518>thereof<s%>, and the bowls <S%H7184>thereof<s%>, and the flagons <S%H2004>thereof<s%>, wherewith to <S%H5258>pour<s%> <S%H2889>out<s%>, of pure <S%H2091>gold<s%>.

And he <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H4501>candlestick<s%> of <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%>: of beaten <S%H4749>work<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> he the <S%H4501>candlestick<s%>, even its <S%H3409>base<s%>, and its <S%H7070>shaft<s%>; its <S%H1375>cups<s%>, it <S%H3730>knops<s%>, and its <S%H6525>flowers<s%>, were of one piece with it.

And there were <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H7070>branches<s%> going <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H6654>sides<s%> <S%H7969>thereof<s%>; three <S%H7070>branches<s%> of the <S%H4501>candlestick<s%> out of the <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6654>side<s%> <S%H7969>thereof<s%>, and three <S%H7070>branches<s%> of the <S%H4501>candlestick<s%> out of the <S%H8145>other<s%> side <S%H6654>thereof<s%>:

three <S%H7969><s%> <S%H1375>cups<s%> made like <S%H8246>almond-blossoms<s%> in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7070>branch<s%>, a <S%H3730>knop<s%> and a <S%H6525>flower<s%>, and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H1375>cups<s%> made like <S%H8246>almond-blossoms<s%> in the <S%H259>other<s%> <S%H7070>branch<s%>, a <S%H3730>knop<s%> and a <S%H6525>flower<s%>: so for the <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H7070>branches<s%> going <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H4501>candlestick<s%>.
And in the <S%H4501>candlestick<s%> were <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H1375>cups<s%> made like <S%H8246>almond-blossoms<s%>, the <S%H3730>knops<s%> <S%H6525>thereof<s%>, and the flowers thereof;

and a <S%H3730>knop<s%> under <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7070>branches<s%> of one piece with <S%H3730>it<s%>, and a knop under <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7070>branches<s%> of one piece with <S%H3730>it<s%>, and a knop under <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7070>branches<s%> of one piece with <S%H8337>it<s%>, for the six <S%H7070>branches<s%> going out of <S%H3318>it<s%>.
Their <S%H3730>knops<s%> and their <S%H7070>branches<s%> were of one piece with <S%H259>it<s%>: the whole of it was one beaten <S%H4749>work<s%> of <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%>.
And he <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H5216>lamps<s%> <S%H7651>thereof<s%>, seven, and the <S%H4457>snuffers<s%> <S%H4289>thereof<s%>, and the snuffdishes <S%H2889>thereof<s%>, of pure <S%H2091>gold<s%>.
Of a <S%H3603>talent<s%> of <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> he <S%H3627>it<s%>, and all the vessels thereof.

And he <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H7004>incense<s%> of <S%H7848>acacia<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%>: a <S%H520>cubit<s%> was the <S%H753>length<s%> <S%H520>thereof<s%>, and a cubit the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> <S%H7251>thereof<s%>, foursquare; and two <S%H520>cubits<s%> was the <S%H6967>height<s%> <S%H7161>thereof<s%>; the horns thereof were of one piece with it.

And he <S%H6823>overlaid<s%> it with <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%>, the <S%H1406>top<s%> <S%H7023>thereof<s%>, and the sides thereof round <S%H5439>about<s%>, and the <S%H7161>horns<s%> of <S%H6213>it<s%>: and he made unto it a <S%H2213>crown<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>.

And he <S%H6213>made<s%> for it <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H2885>rings<s%> under the <S%H2213>crown<s%> <S%H8147>thereof<s%>, upon the two <S%H6763>ribs<s%> <S%H8147>thereof<s%>, upon the two <S%H6654>sides<s%> of <S%H1004>it<s%>, for places for <S%H905>staves<s%> wherewith to bear <S%H5375>it<s%>.
And he <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H905>staves<s%> of <S%H7848>acacia<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%>, and <S%H6823>overlaid<s%> them with <S%H2091>gold<s%>.

And he <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4888>anointing<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%>, and the <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H7004>incense<s%> of sweet <S%H5561>spices<s%>, after the <S%H4639>art<s%> of the <S%H7543>perfumer<s%>.
